channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Samsung One UI 8.5 : tout ce qui change avec la mise à jour des Galaxy S26
item.description: Les nouveaux Galaxy S26, S26 Plus et S26 Ultra s'accompagnent de la mise à jour Samsung One UI 8.5 et de son lot de nouveautés. Voici toutes les fonctions à connaître.

item.title: Samsung’s Galaxy S26 Phones Are Light On Hardware Upgrades, Heavy on AI
item.description: No surprise here. The Galaxy S26, S26+, and S26 Ultra really lean into AI features.

item.title: How the Targaryens of ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Connect to ‘House of the Dragon’ and ‘Game of Thrones’
item.description: It’s a tangled family tree—and just about everyone meets a terrible end.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 vs Galaxy S25 : qu’est-ce qui change ? Le résumé exhaustif des différences
item.description: Faut-il acheter l'un des des derniers Galaxy S26 ou bien leur préférer les S25 qui ont déjà fait leurs preuves ? Réponse dans cet article détaillé.

item.title: Samsung’s Galaxy Buds 4 and 4 Pro Change Up the Look Big Time
item.description: No frills here, just a big emphasis on sound and ANC.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 et 4 Pro : un nouveau design et une réduction de bruit intelligente pour titiller les AirPods
item.description: Samsung présente aujourd’hui une quatrième série de Buds. Déclinés en deux versions, Classique et Pro, ils promettent légèreté et design affirmé.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26, S26+ et S26 Ultra : caractéristiques, prix et date de sortie, tout ce qu’il faut savoir
item.description: Chaque année, Samsung nous livre sa nouvelle fournée de Galaxy S et la marque revient en 2026 avec trois nouveaux modèles. Voici les Galaxy S26, S26+ et S26 Ultra.

item.title: Gemini Can Now Book You an Uber or Order a DoorDash Meal on Your Phone. Here's How It Works
item.description: Starting with the Samsung Galaxy S26, Google's Gemini can automate tasks in popular mobile apps. We got a live demo of the new feature in action.

item.title: Gemini is getting its first agentic capabilities
item.description: Google's Gemini AI is getting one step closer to being more like an actual assistant. Starting with some Pixel 10 phones and the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, Gemini will be able to hail an Uber or put together a DoorDash order on its own. It's called task automation, and it starts with a prompt to […]

item.title: The Galaxy S26 and S26 Plus are more of the same for more money
item.description: There's a cool new hardware feature debuting at Samsung's annual Unpacked event - but you won't find it on the Galaxy S26 or S26 Plus. While the Ultra model gets a new Privacy Display and avoids a price hike, Samsung's base models are largely software updates that cost more than the outgoing models. Don't get […]

item.title: I’m super impressed with the Galaxy S26 Ultra’s new Privacy Display
item.description: Maybe it's a reflection of just how slow hardware innovation has been, but the Galaxy S26 Ultra's new Privacy Display, which limits the screen's viewing angle to keep any would-be peepers away, left me totally impressed. It's not a brand-new technology - we've seen it before in laptops - and it was leaked thoroughly before […]

item.title: Samsung’s still chasing the AirPods with its new Galaxy Buds 4 and Buds 4 Pro
item.description: The next Galaxy Buds have been announced, and Samsung again mimics Apple in design, ecosystem functionality, and pricing. The Galaxy Buds 4 and Galaxy Buds 4 Pro keep the AirPods-esque design of the Buds 3, but now have a flat metal surface along the stem's exterior. The regular buds use a single 11mm dynamic speaker […]

item.title: Gemini can now automate some multi-step tasks on Android
item.description: Gemini on Android will be able to automate tasks involving rideshare requests, or grocery or food delivery, says Google.

item.title: I thought the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra was a boring upgrade — then I saw Privacy Display, and it's best phone upgrade I've seen in years
item.description: Samsung's new Privacy Display is excellent, and I already want every phone to have it.

item.title: 'I'm loving the audio and design upgrades, but one huge problem remains': after using Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Pro for one week, there's still an issue
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Pro enjoy a slight redesign, a makeover and a spec upgrade, and best of all, no price hike to match.

item.title: I went hands-on with the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra – and it has one killer feature even Apple could steal
item.description: The best Samsung Galaxy phone is even better, but this iterative upgrade holds an innovative and unique feature that's ripe for copying.

item.title: Samsung lance le Galaxy S26 Ultra un smartphone taillé pour anticiper vos désirs
item.description: Samsung a dégainé son Galaxy S26 Ultra, fer de lance d'une gamme qui cherche son second souffle. Plus fin, plus léger et dopé à l'IA agentique, le terminal ultra-premium du Coréen s'offre quelques ajustements techniques bienvenus, notamment sur la vitesse de charge et l'ouverture de ses capteurs photo.

item.title: J’ai pris en main les Samsung Galaxy S26 et S26 Plus et j’ai deux grands espoirs
item.description: Je partage avec vous mes premières impressions sur les nouveaux Samsung Galaxy S26 et Galaxy S26 Plus après les avoir pris en main.

item.title: L’écran confidentiel du Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra change la donne et j’ai adoré : voici ma prise en main
item.description: J'ai pris en main le Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra qui m'a fait une forte impression avec son impressionnant écran à l'affichage confidentiel.

item.title: Voici les nouveaux Samsung Galaxy S26 : une évolution (trop) tranquille et une facture trop salée
item.description: Samsung vient de lever le voile sur ses nouveaux Galaxy S26 et S26 Plus et l'un des deux nous semble déjà plus intéressant que l'autre.

item.title: Galaxy S26, S26 Plus et S26 Ultra : tout ce qu’il faut savoir pour précommander au meilleur prix les nouveaux fleurons de Samsung
item.description: Ce mercredi 25 février 2026 lève enfin le voile sur les nouveaux fleurons de Samsung : les Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26 Plus et Galaxy S26 Ultra. Les précommandes sont déjà ouvertes et il y a même des réductions.

item.title: Votre vieille imprimante continuera de fonctionner sur Windows 11 finalement, Microsoft s’est trompé
item.description: Microsoft laissait entendre que Windows 11 ne prendrait bientôt plus en charge certaines imprimantes anciennes. Fausse alerte.

item.title: Capybara Simulator Is the Perfect Game to Tide You Over Until GTA 6 Wrecks Civilization
item.description: Take this time in your pond to gird yourself against the coming storm.

item.title: OpenAI COO says ads will be ‘an iterative process’
item.description: COO Brad Lightcap noted that ads can add to the product experience of users if they are done right. He urged to give OpenAI a few months to see how the company fares in rolling out the product.

item.title: From Pokémon Champions to a Gen 10 reveal — here’s everything I hope gets announced at this week’s Pokémon Presents event
item.description: The next Pokémon Presents showcase is happening soon, and there’s a strong chance of some really big reveals.

item.title: Trump says AI data centers should be powered by tech companies. Will that actually lower your electricity bill?
item.description: At his State of the Union address, the president announced a ‘ratepayer protection pledge.’ Experts say it may not do much good. The growing backlash to data centers, and the rising electricity bills that accompany them, has become difficult for politicians to ignore.

item.title: « 3€ par mois à cause de votre ancien compte Lydia », on démêle le vrai du faux
item.description: La célèbre application de paiement entre amis se retrouve au cœur d'une vive polémique. De nombreux internautes craignent de devoir payer des frais inattendus, mais la réalité s'avère bien plus nuancée.

item.title: 'An exceptional 3D printing experience': Our 3D printer expert praised the high-speed Creality K1 - and for $309, it's perfect for beginners
item.description: At just over $300, the high-speed, beginner-friendly Creality K1 offers an affordable way to get started with 3D printing.

item.title: Cette balise Bluetooth ultra-fine à glisser dans votre portefeuille est à -20 % sur Amazon
item.description: L'Ugreen FineTrack Slim est un traceur Bluetooth très pratique grâce à son design lui permettant de se glisser partout ou de s'accrocher à un vélo. En ce moment, il s'offre une petite remise de six euros.

item.title: Proton VPN releases "quality-of-life" update for iOS users — Mac and Linux VPN apps are next
item.description: Proton VPN is closing the feature gap between its applications, introducing city-level map pins for iOS and confirming that a major visual overhaul for its Linux and Mac clients is finally underway.

item.title: Hacker used Anthropic's Claude chatbot to attack multiple government agencies in Mexico
item.description: Here's yet another troubling story about this "golden" era of AI. A hacker has exploited Anthropic's Claude chatbot to carry out attacks against Mexican government agencies, according to a report by Bloomberg. This resulted in the theft of 150GB of official government data, including taxpayer records, employee credentials and more. The hacker used Claude to find vulnerabilities in government networks and to write scripts to exploit them. It also tasked the chatbot with finding ways to automate data theft, as indicated by cybersecurity company Gambit Security. This started in December and conti...

item.title: Want to Know If Glassholes Are Using Smart Glasses Near You? There’s an App for That
item.description: The app called Nearby Glasses scans Bluetooth signals to detect and alert users when the camera-equipped glasses are nearby.

item.title: Another top adult site reveals data leak - Frivol says around 479,000 users may be affected
item.description: An adult site kept an open database, but it played down its importance.

item.title: New Galaxy Buds are expected to launch today — but Galaxy Buds 3 Pro just got more affordable
item.description: Samsung is expected to unveil its newest Galaxy Buds earbuds today, which means you can find an excellent deal on the fantastic-sounding Galaxy Buds Pro 3.

item.title: Nothing Phone (4a) : la marque dévoile son smartphone en détail quelques heures avant Samsung
item.description: Nothing ne compte pas se laisser intimider par les présentations de ses concurrents. Après avoir programmé sa conférence 24h après l'événement d'Apple, la marque anticipe le lancement du Galaxy S26 avec la présentation du Nothing Phone (4a).

item.title: Who needs a Chromebook? This HP Windows 11 laptop is perfect for hybrid workers - and includes with a 15.6in touchscreen and Microsoft 365 for under $300
item.description: It's the perfect day-to-day laptop for students and remote & hybrid professionals.

item.title: Amazon abandons open-world racing game by former Forza Horizon devs
item.description: An open-world racing game from a studio formed by ex-Forza Horizon developers was due to be published by Amazon, but that is no longer the case. As reported first by The Game Business, UK-based Maverick Games is now in "active dialogue" with prospective new publishing partners for its currently untitled debut game, which remains in development. Maverick was founded in 2022 by Mike Brown, who served as the Horizon series’ creative director during his stint at Playground Games, and was able to tempt a number of other ex-Playground veterans to join the new studio. Little was publicly known about ...

item.title: The Teaser for Jane Schoenbrun’s New Horror Movie Will Melt Your Mind
item.description: 'Teenage Sex and Death at Camp Miasma,' the latest from the creator of 'I Saw the TV Glow,' stars Hannah Einbinder and Gillian Anderson and hits theaters in August.

item.title: ASUS ProArt GoPro Edition PX13 review: An incredible if pricy Windows creator laptop
item.description: With its ProArt lineup, ASUS has commendably addressed a glaring hole in the PC market by targeting video editors and other creative pros. Its latest model even uses a popular camera marque in its name: the ProArt GoPro Edition PX13. It’s a true co-branding exercise, with GoPro-like styling, a dedicated GoPro hotkey, mil-spec durability for extreme outdoor users and 12 months of GoPro’s Cloud Plus Premium. It has a lot going for it on the inside, too. The AMD Ryzen AI Max+ 395 processor offers 16 Zen 5 cores with integrated Radeon 8060S Graphics (40 cores) and AMD Ryzen AI with up to 50 NPU TO...

item.title: Live: Samsung unveils new Galaxy phones
item.description: We're here in San Francisco, where Samsung is set to unveil its new Galaxy S26 series phones and probably some accessories to go with them starting at 1PM ET. Keep in mind this isn't Samsung's foldy phone event, which usually occurs in the summer. One of the things we're most curious about is whether the […]

item.title: Samsung Unpacked 2026: live updates from the Galaxy S26 announcement event
item.description: On Wednesday, February 25th, Samsung will hold an event in San Francisco where it’s expected to reveal the Galaxy S26, S26 Plus, and S26 Ultra phones, among other things. Based on leaks and Samsung’s own ads, we’re expecting at least one of the phones to come with a display that can black out sensitive content […]

item.description: All the ways to watch PSG vs Monaco live streams online, with the home side leading the key Champions League clash 3-2 after their first leg.

item.description: All the ways to watch Real Madrid vs Benfica live streams for free, with José Mourinho out to haunt his old side in this UCL knockout phase playoff 2nd leg.

item.title: Prime Video teases 'more goodies are on the way' for The Boys season 5 — and I'd really like a full-blown trailer to be one of them
item.description: The Boys fans are about to be treated to "more goodies" ahead of season 5's debut, Prime Video says.

item.title: Tinder says Gen Z still believes in true love—they just want a soft launch first (exclusive)
item.description: New data shows young singles still want marriage but are prioritizing ‘micro-commitments,’ group chats, and slower-build relationships. Gen Z still believes in true love, even if the pursuit looks a little different from their parents’ generation.

item.title: Discord delays global age verification rollout after user backlash
item.description: The global rollout is now delayed to the second half of 2026. Discord, the popular platform for gamers to communicate online, is postponing its controversial age verification policy after receiving swift backlash from users with concerns about their privacy.

item.title: OpenClaw creator’s advice to AI builders is to be more playful and allow yourself time to improve
item.description: Peter Steinberger talks about the creation of his viral AI agent OpenClaw and how being more "playful" makes for a better way to learn AI coding.

item.title: Pourquoi les Dacia Duster et Bigster hybrides intègrent un moteur électrique avec une inédite boîte de vitesse… comme sur la Porsche Taycan
item.description: Une voiture électrique n'a pas besoin de boîte de vitesses. C'est du moins ce que l'on pensait jusqu'à ce que Porsche, Mercedes et aujourd'hui Dacia ne viennent bousculer la donne. Avec son nouveau système hybride 4x4, le constructeur roumain intègre une boîte à deux rapports dédiée à son moteur électrique arrière. Une solution technique complexe, mais pour des raisons radicalement différentes de ses concurrents allemands. ...

item.title: Trees Fire Off Ultraviolet Sparkles During Thunderstorms, Scientists Confirm
item.description: Scientists have observed "coronae" on treetops for the first time, confirming the phenomenon occurs in the wild.

item.title: The Louvre museum gets a new boss after the jewelry heist
item.description: Leribault brings a proven track record of running the Versailles Palace and Paris’ Orsay Museum. The home of the “Mona Lisa” is getting a new boss. Art historian Christophe Leribault, a veteran museum director, is taking over at the Louvre, shouldering the challenge of getting the world’s largest museum out of crisis after the brazen heist in October of the French crown jewels....

item.title: 'Windows 11 is far from perfect': Microsoft just released an update I actually want to install — and you should too
item.description: Microsoft is forcing another Windows 11 update on us, but this one is actually worth installing

item.title: NordVPN refreshes its mobile experience with clearer stats and easier navigation
item.description: NordVPN has launched a redesigned mobile app focused on usability, featuring a cleaner interface, an expanded map view, unified search, and enhanced protection statistics. Here’s what changed and how it benefits users.

item.title: Free Resident Evil Requiem: Edit by day, survive by night with Samsung's immersive 49in ultrawide video editing monitor deal
item.description: 5120 x 1440 resolution, 240Hz speed, and cinematic 32:9 immersion, plus a free Resident Evil Requiem game code.

item.title: Comment suivre le Samsung Unpacked pour découvrir en direct les nouveaux smartphones Galaxy
item.description: On y est. C'est aujourd'hui, mercredi 25 février, que Samsung abat ses cartes pour l'année 2026. Entre le Galaxy S26 Ultra qui a fait une cure d'amincissement et les promesses de l'IA agentique, il y a de quoi dire. Voici comment ne rien rater.

item.title: A White House Staffer Appears to Run Massive Pro-Trump X Account
item.description: A popular right-wing account that called a video depicting Barack and Michelle Obama as apes "a masterpiece" appears to be run by a White House staffer, according to records reviewed by WIRED.

item.title: Circle stock price: Why the crypto company is soaring over 25% today
item.description: The USDC stablecoin issuer got some good news Wednesday after better-than-expected Q4 2025 earnings. The crypto market got some good news on Wednesday morning, as Circle reported better-than-expected earnings numbers, sending its stock soaring.

item.title: La Sony Bravia Theatre 6 s’offre 20 % de réduction, une barre de son pour une expérience home cinema Dolby Atmos haut de gamme
item.description: Malgré ses quatre modules, la Sony Bravia Theatre System 6 est très simple d'installation et est compatible avec le Dolby Atmos. Par ailleurs, la barre de son s'offre une promotion de 120 euros chez Amazon et Boulanger.

item.title: Guerre contre les bloqueurs de pub : et maintenant, Google masque les commentaires et les descriptions dans YouTube
item.description: La guerre menée par Google contre les bloqueurs de contenus est loin d'être terminée. Le géant du web trouve des solutions toujours plus élaborées pour pourrir la vie des utilisateurs de ces logiciels et extensions ; la vexation du jour consiste à supprimer les descriptions des vidéos et leurs commentaires.

item.title: Artemis 2 Crew Watches as Trump Snubs Moon Mission in State of the Union Address
item.description: During the record-long speech, the President made no mention of NASA's most important crewed mission since the Apollo era, even though the astronauts were in the audience.

item.title: How to watch Survivor 50 online – stream FREE and from anywhere
item.description: As the popular show celebrates its half-century season, here's how to watch Survivor 50 online from anywhere – including FREE streams.

item.title: Spotify’s Smart Reorder treats your playlists like a DJ set
item.description: Spotify's "Mix" feature now has an option called "Smart Reorder" that can automatically sort users' playlists based on beats per minute (BPM) and key, organizing songs for the best flow from one track to the next. It builds on the existing Mix feature in Spotify and, along with transitions between songs, which were introduced in […]

item.title: 'Elegant and ingenious': The Herman Miller Embody is our best office chair for long hours - now our top pick for comfort gets a $406 price-cut
item.description: Herman Miller's Embody has the features I look for in a high-end ergonomic chair, including dynamic support that adapts to your movements during long hours at the desk.

item.description: Nature really has a lot to say, if we're willing to take a closer look.
